dashboard.label: Index Usage Reporting
dashboard.definition:
{"dataSources":{"ds_search_1_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=_internal sourcetype="search_logs" "IndexScopedSearch is called for index =" 
| rex field=_raw "for index = (?<index_list>\S+)," 
| where NOT like(index_list, "%<%>%") 
| dedup index_list 
| table index_list 
| rename index_list as indexes_list 
| eval Observed=1 
| append 
 [|rest /services/data/indexes | stats values(title) as indexes_list 
 | eval Observed=0 ] 
| stats max(Observed) as Observed by indexes_list 
| where Observed=0 | fields - Observed | rename indexes_list as "Indexes Not Searched"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"Indexes Not Searched"},"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=_internal sourcetype="search_logs" "IndexScopedSearch is called for index =" 
| rex field=_raw "for index = (?<index_list>\S+)," 
| where NOT like(index_list, "%<%>%") 
| stats count(index_list) AS accessed_count last(_time) As last_accessed by index_list 
| eval last_accessed=round(last_accessed,0) 
| eval last_accessed=strftime(last_accessed,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S")","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"Indexes Searched"}},"visualizations":{"viz_table_1_new":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":20,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new"},"title":"Indexes Not Searched"},"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":20,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"title":"Indexes Searched"}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"grid","options":{},"structure":[{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":590,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_table_1_new","type":"block","position":{"x":590,"y":0,"w":610,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"title":"Index Usage Reporting","description":"Index Usage Reporting","defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}}}
